CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1956, pg. A24, reads: "Married At Fair - While their attendants look on, Mr. and Mrs. Matthew Brown accept a Bible from Maurice Contay, following their wedding at The Courier Home Service Fair, which was held at Syria Mosque. The bride is the former Catherine Hodge.  Left to right: Miss Dolores Wilkinson, the bride, Mr. Contay, the groom, and his brother, James Brown. - Harris Photo."image published by Pittsburgh Courier with graphic addition of wedding cake in related image 2001.35.47431.
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of bridal party, from left, Dolores Wilkinson, bride Catherine Hodge Brown, Maurice Contay presenting a bible to the couple, groom Matthew Brown, and James Brown, posed on platform in front of demonstration kitchen in Syria Mosque during the 1956 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
